item.title: About Me
item.description: TL;DR I’m researching the behavior of people when learning with computer applications. To do this, I not only analyze the log files using machine learning methods, but also create the applications that capture the log files. Skills and interests 👩‍🏫 👩‍🔬👩‍💻 Certificates 👩‍🎓 SAP Technology Consultant Google Cloud Certification Kleiner Maschinenschein Hobbies 🎨 🎮 PC/Console 🚵‍♀️ Mountainbike 🏄‍♀️ Wakeboard 🖌️ Warhammer 40k Mail
